{
  "name": "@gentleduck/vim",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "type": "module",
  "files": [
    "dist"
  ],
  "types": "./dist/index.d.ts",
  "module": "./dist/index.js",
  "exports": {
    ".": "./src/index.ts",
    "./*": "./src/*/index.ts"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rimraf dist .cache .turbo node_modules .next .velite",
    "clean:git": "git clean -xdf .cache .turbo node_modules dist",
    "build": "tsdown",
    "dev": "vitest",
    "test": "vitest run",
    "lint": "biome lint --write ./",
    "format": "biome format --write ./",
    "ci": "pnpm run lint && pnpm run format && pnpm run test && pnpm run build",
    "release": "changeset version",
    "publish": "pnpm run ci && changeset publish"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@gentleduck/tsdown-config": "workspace:*",
    "@gentleduck/typescript-config": "workspace:*",
    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^5.17.0",
    "@testing-library/user-event": "^14.6.1",
    "@types/jsdom": "^21.1.7",
    "@types/node": "catalog:",
    "@types/react": "catalog:react19",
    "@types/react-dom": "catalog:react19",
    "clsx": "^1.2.1",
    "jsdom": "^20.0.3",
    "react": "catalog:react19",
    "react-dom": "catalog:react19",
    "rimraf": "^4.4.1",
    "tailwind-merge": "^1.14.0",
    "tsdown": "catalog:",
    "typescript": "catalog:",
    "vite": "catalog:",
    "vitest": "catalog:",
    "zod": "catalog:"
  },
  "packageManager": "pnpm@10.10.0",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=22.0.0"
  }
}
